# Model Card for cycLingo NMT model

<!-- Provide a quick summary of what the model is/does. -->

MarianMT language model Helsinki-NLP/opus-mt-tc-big-en-gmq fine-tuned on a custom dataset to translate text from bicycle domain from english to norwegian.

Dash app with cyclingoNER and cyclingo translation model available at this github repo: https://github.com/danielhellebust/cycLingo
